tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"我的不死军团在哪里？","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['[{"text":"按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}, " 原地生成一只僵尸和一只恼鬼。"]','{"text":"僵尸在场时，召唤师获得抗性提升 2。","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"（伤害减免 40 %）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"僵尸攻击力为 3 点，移动速度比玩家略慢，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"生命值为 20 点（每秒自然流失 3 点）。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"恼鬼攻击力为 5 点，可以穿透墙壁攻击玩家。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"（但其实很难瞄到玩家）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}','{"text":"生命值为 14 点（每秒自然流失 2 点）。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"可以触发辉煌裂片。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 枚","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"25 秒 (白昼)","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":" / 15 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
